namespace.select:
select a.* from employee_group as a
a.GroupId = @GroupId
a.EmployeeId = @EmployeeId
namespace.delete:
delete from employee_group
where AggregateId in (@AggregateId);
namespace.select: select a.* from resource as a inner join group_resource as gr on a.AggregateId = gr.ResourceId inner join employee_group as eg on eg.GroupId = gr.GroupId where eg.EmployeeId = @EmployeeId;
select a.*, (select EmployeeId from employee_group as eg where a.AggregateId = eg.GroupId and eg.EmployeeId = @EmployeeId) as OwnerId from `group` as a where a.DepartmentId = @DepartmentId
